definitions.definition: A number of birds together in a group, such as those gathered together for the purpose of migration .
A large number of animals associated together in a group; commonly used of sheep , but ( dated ) also used for goats , farmed animals, and a wide variety of animals.
Those served by a particular pastor or shepherd .

main_definition: A number of birds together in a group, such as those gathered together for the purpose of migration .
secondary_definitions: A large number of animals associated together in a group; commonly used of sheep , but ( dated ) also used for goats , farmed animals, and a wide variety of animals.
Those served by a particular pastor or shepherd .

definitions.definition: Coarse tufts of wool or cotton used in bedding .
A lock of wool or hair .

Very fine sifted woollen refuse, especially that from shearing the nap of cloths, formerly used as a coating for wallpaper to give it a velvety or clothlike appearance; also, the dust of vegetable fibre used for a similar purpose.

main_definition: Coarse tufts of wool or cotton used in bedding .
secondary_definitions: A lock of wool or hair .

Very fine sifted woollen refuse, especially that from shearing the nap of cloths, formerly used as a coating for wallpaper to give it a velvety or clothlike appearance; also, the dust of vegetable fibre used for a similar purpose.
